answers.author: Emma Jurado
answers.text:
Hi Brian,
I found the following on Sequencing Batch Reactors (SBR). Check out chapter 3 for operational problems.  http://www.neiwpcc.org/neiwpcc_docs/sbr_manual.pdf
I hope that this is helpful,
Emma Jurado

answers.author: Brian Wilson
answers.text:
Emma, this is a great resource and thank you for sharing it.  This answers some of my questions, but I would still like some concrete examples of problems experienced by other municipalities if anyone else has any.


Emma, this is a great resource and thank you for sharing it.  This answers some of my questions, but I would still like some concrete examples of problems experienced by other municipalities if anyone else has any.

author: Brian Wilson
text: Does your city utilze a Siemens/Jet-Tech manufactured Sequencing Batch Reactor (SBR) for wastewater treatment?  Have you had any problems with clogged Solids Excluding Valves (SEVs)?  Also, do you utilize a mechanical bar screen to filter the influent?  If so, how fine of a screen do you use?
title: Sequencing Batch Reactor for Wastewater Treatment
